text: The following lists events that happened in 1937 in Iceland. ==Incumbents== *Monarch - Kristján X *Prime Minister - Hermann Jónasson ==Events== ==Births== Birgir Sigurðsson *8 February - Skúli Níelsen, footballer *17 March - Páll Bragi Pétursson, politician. *22 March - Edvard Júlíus Sólnes, politician. *14 April - Jón Stefánsson, footballer *20 April - Jakob Jakobsson, footballer *13 June - Heimir Guðjónsson, footballer *19 June - Björn S. Stefánsson, social scientist *28 August - Birgir Sigurðsson, writer *1 September - Sveinn Jónsson, footballer ==Deaths== *28 November - Magnús Guðmundsson, politician (b. 1879). ==References== Category:1930s in Iceland Iceland Iceland Category:Years of the 20th century in Iceland
title: 1937 in Iceland
